title: La Haine (1995)
description: A Mathieu Kassovitz-directed thriller where we follow the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot. Kassovitz uses handheld cameras and fixed cameras on tripods to create a realistic feeling for the audience. The film was originally shot in color, but Kassovitz changed it to black and white in post-production, giving La Haine its timeless look.

title: Offset - CODE ft. Moneybagg Yo (2022)
description: The music video for "CODE" by Offset featuring Moneybagg Yo is visually striking and matches the energy and themes of the song. In the video, both artists perform in various gritty, urban settings, enhancing the tough and assertive lyrics of the track. The video features scenes with luxury cars, dynamic group performances, and visually engaging effects that emphasize the rhythm and mood of the music. The overall aesthetic is dark and stylish, with a focus on street fashion and a portrayal of a lavish lifestyle, which is common in hip hop videos. The video complements the song's themes of success, power, and street credibility.
